variable.name: Individual_ID
variable.description: Subject Identifier

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: CONTACT OCCASION
variable.comment: Please find encoded value descriptions in associated documents. Some of the values might be encoded and code descriptions have not been submitted at this time.

variable.name: MHXA1
variable.description: 1: Told you snore loudly, bother others while sleep

variable.name: MHXA2
variable.description: 2: Told that you stop breathing in your sleep

variable.name: MHXA3
variable.description: 3: Fall asleep during the day

variable.name: MHXA4
variable.description: 4: You are tired after sleeping

variable.name: MHXA5
variable.description: 5: You feel sleepy/fall asleep while driving

variable.name: MHXA6
variable.description: 6: Rate your sleep quality overall

variable.name: MHXA7
variable.description: 7: Hours of actual sleep at night (Hours)?

variable.name: MHXA8
variable.description: 8: Ever had any pain/discomfort in chest?

variable.name: MHXA9
variable.description: 9: Chest pain walking up hill?

variable.name: MHXA10
variable.description: 10: Chest pain walking at ordinary pace on level?

variable.name: MHXA11

variable.name: MHXA12
variable.description: 12: If you stand still, what happens?

variable.name: MHXA13
variable.description: 13: Time required for relief of chest pain

variable.name: MHXA14A
variable.description: 14a: Pain location-sternum (upper or middle)?

variable.name: MHXA14B
variable.description: 14b: Pain location-sternum (lower)?

variable.name: MHXA14C
variable.description: 14c: Pain location-left anterior chest?

variable.description: 14d: Pain location-left arm?

variable.name: MHXA14E
variable.description: 14e: Pain location-other?

variable.name: MHXA14F
variable.description: 14f: Specify other pain location

variable.name: MHXA15
variable.description: 15: Do you feel chest pain anywhere else?

variable.name: MHXA16
variable.description: 16: Saw a doctor because of chest pain?

variable.name: MHXA17
variable.description: 17: What did the doctor say it was?

variable.name: MHXA18
variable.description: 18: Hospitalized because of chest pain?

variable.name: MHXA19
variable.description: 19: How long ago did chest pain start?

variable.name: MHXA20
variable.description: 20: Within past 2 months, chest pain?

variable.name: MHXA21
variable.description: 21: Occurred at least twice as often as before?

variable.name: MHXA22
variable.description: 22: More severe pain in past 2 months?

variable.name: MHXA23
variable.description: 23: Longer lasting pain in past 2 months?

variable.name: MHXA24
variable.description: 24: Use nitroglycerin to relieve pain?

variable.name: MHXA25
variable.description: 25: Needed more nitroglycerin in past 2 months?

variable.name: MHXA26
variable.description: 26: Get pain w/less exertion in past 2 months?

variable.name: MHXA27
variable.description: 27: In the past 2 months, has the pain required more nitroglycerin

variable.name: MHXA28
variable.description: 28: Pain when sleeping in past 2 months?

variable.name: MHXA29
variable.description: 29: Ever had severe pain 1/2 hr + across chest front?

variable.name: MHXA30
variable.description: 30: Saw a doctor because of this pain?

variable.name: MHXA31
variable.description: 31: What did the doctor say it was?

variable.name: MHXA32
variable.description: 32: Hospitalized for heart attack a week +?

variable.name: MHXA33
variable.description: 33: How many such heart attacks?
